verses.verse: An Alleluia. Praise God in his holies; praise him in the firmament of his power.
Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his abundant majesty:
praise him with the sounding trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and kithara:
praise him with the tympanum and chorus: praise him with stringed instruments and organs;
praise him with soft sounding cymbals: praise him with the cymbals of triumph:
let every breath praise the Lord.
